(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (If 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "x")))))))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (If 
          (Then) 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "y")))))))))))
